***SPECIAL UPDATE***
- New Event is Here, let's SAVE THE ROBOT! Collecting energy and will get free robot line skin.
- New Level, Dream of Sky, Leonardo Da Vinci once said 'Once you fly, you will walk with eyes skyward'.
- Infinite Heart, this new item will help you pass the level much easier.

We've spent a lot of time working on new story about the level, hope you'll like it.
And don't forget to follow us on Facebook @DancingLineGame for more information.

**World Cup Update**
Special event for The World Cup is coming! Beat the HARDEST level in this chilling summer!
- New level: The Football. Dare you challenge and become the champion of your own?
- New event: Team up with Dancing Line now and get limited FREE rewards now.
- New line skin: Fireball, only available in this special update.
And don't forget to follow us on Facebook @DancingLineGame for more information.

***Update***
-New system update, you can get all levels and skins through the new system now!
-Fixed some problems.

***Update***
1. New level: The War. Find out the double ending!
2. New event: Complete the challenge to unlock the new level for free!

***Update***
-New Event: Daily free level. Now you have 1 level for free everyday! Come to challenge!

***Update***
-New level: The Amusement park, come to find your memories!
-New event: Daily free level is coming. Now you have 1 level for free everyday! Come to try!

***Update*** 
1.New Level: The Indian Journey, discover your love in India!
2.Fix icloud storage problem.Please over-installation game instead of re-installation to prevent losing some game data.

***Update***
New level: Exodus. let's explore the mystery in new level!
Added: Tutorial. New players can follow the line and learn how to play step by step.
Added: Countdown of removing ads

**Update**
-New level: Cathedral-Remix. Let's begin the desert adventure!
-New system: Tool system. Use tools to pass levels!

**Special Update**
HAPPY HALLOWEEN!
- NEW LEVEL, The Halloween Puzzle, go get lost in the magic world!
- NEW FEATURE, now you can directly start on the checkpoint for play, how cool is that!
- REWARDS, we have tons of events and rewards coming in this update.

Others: Our developers was taken by the Magic Witch, so she won't be available on this update, we'll bring her back in the next update.

**Spring Festival Update**
- New level: Chinese Spring Festival, The new level brings dozens of Chinese New Year folklore features such as dragon and lion dances, temple fairs, and firecrackers. It will take you to experience the Chinese tradition!
- Function Optimization: Simplified game flow, now it's smoother!
- Event Optimization: Join in the water collection event to gain plenty of hearts & lives!
